title: Glucose-Based Highly-Porous Activated Carbon Nano Sphere (g-ACNS) for High Capacity Hydrogen Storage
content:

Nanoporous glucose-based active carbon nanospheres (g-ACNS) with high efficiency and stability in hydrogen (H2) storage is synthesized by a hydrothermal method followed by multiple KOH activation processes. For the optimized...
